DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate patient chronic low back pain ( last 3 month postoperative ) effect instrumental rehabilitation use I-Moove ® device compare conventional physiotherapy rehabilitation ambulatory postural stability ( mean standard deviation excursion center gravity ) without visual control , 6 week start rehabilitation protocol . DOC.brief_title: Traditional Rehabilitation Versus Rehabilitation With Imoove® Device Spinal Musculoskeletal Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study evaluate compare two physical therapy technique 6 week 6 month start rehabilitation protocol term : A - improve postural stability visual control unstable surface ( without visual control ) B - improving level abdominal strength ( Ito test ) erector spinae ( Sørensen test ) C - impact back pain daily life use questionnaire ( Dallas , Québec , FABQ Tampa questionnaires/scores ) D - Improvement pain ( Visual Analog Scale ) ,
